summary.title: Fixed /sum Command Registration Issue
summary.description: Investigated and resolved Claude Code command autocomplete issue by adding required YAML front matter

accomplishments.title: Root Cause Analysis
accomplishments.description: Identified missing YAML front matter as the cause of /sum command not appearing in autocomplete

accomplishments.title: Command File Fixed
accomplishments.description: Added required `---\ndescription: ...\n---` front matter to match Claude Code command format

accomplishments.title: Claude Code Behavior Documented
accomplishments.description: Discovered and documented that Claude Code requires restart to register new commands (no hot-reload)

modified.changes: Added YAML front matter with description field
modified.after:

description: Generate comprehensive session summary...

# /sum - Session Summary & Next Steps Generator

technicalDetails.rootCause: Claude Code commands require YAML front matter with 'description' field for registration
technicalDetails.solution: Added front matter matching format of working commands (e.g., /lint)
technicalDetails.verification: Command file now correctly formatted; requires Claude Code restart to take effect

resolved.resolution: Added YAML front matter to command file

nextSteps.task: Restart Claude Code to register /sum command
nextSteps.description: Exit and restart Claude Code session to load the updated command file
Verify /sum command appears in autocomplete and generates proper session summaries
Create guide for creating custom Claude Code commands with proper format requirements

learnings.insight: Commands require YAML front matter and are loaded at startup (no hot-reload)
learnings.application: Always include front matter when creating new commands; restart required

learnings.insight: Compared working command format with non-working command to identify difference
learnings.application: Pattern comparison is effective for configuration issues
